Properties.ProtectedString:
-- Waits for the child of the specified parent local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool = script.Parent
local Animations = {} local MyHumanoid local MyCharacter
local StartAnim = WaitForChild(script, 'Start') local StopAnim = WaitForChild(script, 'Stop')
function PlayAnimation(animationName, speed) speed = speed or 1 if Animations[animationName] then Animations[animationName]:Play(0.1, 1, speed) else print("Can't find animation:" , animationName) end end
function StopAnimation(animationName) if Animations[animationName] then Animations[animationName]:Stop() end end
function ConnectAnimationToValueChange(valueName, animationName) return WaitForChild(Tool, valueName).Changed:connect( function (value) PlayAnimation(animationName) end) end
function LoadAnimation(animationObject) if MyHumanoid then Animations[animationObject.Name] = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(animationObject) else print("Tried to load an anim without a humanoid") end end
function OnEquipped(mouse) MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyHumanoid = WaitForChild(MyCharacter, 'Humanoid')
Tool.ChildAdded:connect(function (child) if child:IsA('Animation') then LoadAnimation(animationObject) end end) for _, child in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if child:IsA('Animation') then LoadAnimation(child) end end end
function OnUnequipped() for name, animTrack in pairs(Animations) do StopAnimation(name); end end
StartAnim.OnInvoke = PlayAnimation StopAnim.OnInvoke = StopAnimation
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

-- SolarCrane
-- Waits for parent.child to exist, then returns it local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
--local tool = Game.Selection:Get()[1]; tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0,-0.4,1.15)
local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris') local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players') local contentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Handle')
local AnimationScript local StartAnim local StopAnim
local HeartScript
local MyMouse local MyTorso local MyHumanoid local MyPlayer local MyCharacter
local HitSound local ShootSound
local SHOOT_DAMAGE_MIN = 25 local SHOOT_DAMAGE_MAX = 45 local SWING_TIME = 1.3 local LASER_TIME = 0.12 local MAX_SHOOT_DISTANCE = 120 local rate=1/30
local BASE_URL = contentProvider.BaseUrl local AmmoTXId = BASE_URL .. 'asset/?id=105977933' local AmmoMeshId = BASE_URL .. 'asset/?id=105992239'
local AmmoPrefab = Instance.new('Part') AmmoPrefab.FormFactor = 'Custom' AmmoPrefab.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.2) AmmoPrefab.Locked = true AmmoPrefab.TopSurface = 'Smooth' AmmoPrefab.BottomSurface = 'Smooth' AmmoPrefab.CanCollide = false AmmoPrefab.Transparency = 0.25 AmmoPrefab.Name = 'Heart'
local AmmoMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') AmmoMesh.TextureId = AmmoTXId AmmoMesh.MeshId = AmmoMeshId AmmoMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.5,1.5,1.2) -- Lets run randomize this from the range of (1,1,1) to (1,0,0) to add a little variation AmmoMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1,1,1) AmmoMesh.Parent = AmmoPrefab
local SCALE_TO_STUD = 5.3 / 2
local CreatorTag
function ApplyTag(target) while target:FindFirstChild('creator') do target.creator:Destroy() end CreatorTag:Clone().Parent = target end
function FindCharacter(part) if part.Parent == nil or part == Workspace then return nil end if part:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then return part end return FindCharacter(part.Parent) end
function RayIgnoreCheck(hit, pos) if hit then if hit.Transparency >= 1 or string.lower(hit.Name) == "water" or hit.Name == "Effect" or hit.Name == "Rocket" or hit.Name == "Bullet" or hit.Name == "Handle" or hit:IsDescendantOf(MyCharacter) then return true end end return false end
-- @preconditions: vec should be a unit vector, and 0 < rayLength <= 1000 function RayCast(startPos, vec, rayLength) local hitObject, hitPos = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(startPos + (vec * .01), vec * rayLength), Handle) if hitObject and hitPos then local distance = rayLength - (hitPos - startPos).magnitude if RayIgnoreCheck(hitObject, hitPos) and distance > 0 then -- there is a chance here for potential infinite recursion return RayCast(hitPos, vec, distance) end end return hitObject, hitPos end
function StartGuiRecharge() if PlayerGui and PlayerGui:FindFirstChild('Bar') and PlayerGui.Bar:FindFirstChild('Backing') and PlayerGui.Bar:FindFirstChild('Fill') and PlayerGui:FindFirstChild('RechargeText') then PlayerGui.RechargeText.Text = "Recharging..." local timeRemaining = math.min(COOLDOWN_TIME, tick() - LastUse) print('Start Size = ', timeRemaining / COOLDOWN_TIME) PlayerGui.Bar.Fill.Size = UDim2.new(timeRemaining / SWING_TIME, 0, 1, 0) PlayerGui.Bar.Fill:TweenSize(UDim2.new(1,0,1,0), "Out", "Linear", SWING_TIME - timeRemaining, false, function() if PlayerGui then PlayerGui.RechargeText.Text = "Ready" end end) end end
function billboard(pos,text,timeVar,color) local pos=pos or Vector3.new(0,0,0) local text=text or "Hello World!" local timeVar = timeVar or 2 local color=color or Color3.new(1,0,0) local pos=pos+Vector3.new(0,5,0) local ep=Instance.new("Part") ep.Name="Effect" ep.formFactor="Custom" ep.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) ep.TopSurface="Smooth" ep.BottomSurface="Smooth" ep.CFrame=CFrame.new(pos) ep.Anchored=true ep.CanCollide=false ep.Transparency=1 local bb=Instance.new("BillboardGui") bb.Size=UDim2.new(3,0,3,0) bb.Adornee=ep local tl=Instance.new("TextLabel") tl.BackgroundTransparency=1 tl.Size=UDim2.new(1,0,1,0) tl.Text=text tl.TextColor3=color tl.TextScaled=true tl.Font="ArialBold"
tl.Parent=bb bb.Parent=ep DebrisService:AddItem(ep,timeVar+.1) ep.Parent=game.Workspace delay(0,function() local frames=timeVar/rate for frame=1,frames do wait(rate) local percent=frame/frames ep.CFrame=CFrame.new(pos)+Vector3.new(0,5*percent,0) tl.TextTransparency=percent end ep:remove() end) end
local HitHumanoids = {} function OnHit(hitPart) if hitPart then local char = FindCharacter(hitPart) local humanoid = char and char:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid ~= MyHumanoid and humanoid and not HitHumanoids[humanoid] and MyHumanoid.Health > 0 and humanoid.Health > 0 and MyCharacter and MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Arm') then ApplyTag(humanoid) HitHumanoids[humanoid] = true -- maybe we display this above head local swingDamage = SHOOT_DAMAGE_MIN + math.random(SHOOT_DAMAGE_MAX - SHOOT_DAMAGE_MIN)
billboard(hitPart.Position,"-"..tostring(swingDamage)) humanoid:TakeDamage(swingDamage) wait(0.1) if HitSound then HitSound:Play() end if HeartScript and char:FindFirstChild('Torso') then local newHeart = HeartScript:Clone() newHeart.Parent = char.Torso newHeart.Disabled = false end end end end
local Attacking = false function OnActivated() if (Attacking or MyHumanoid.Health <= 0) or not MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Arm') or not MyMouse then return end Attacking = true Tool.Enabled = false if ShootSound then ShootSound:Play() end HitHumanoids = {} --StartAnim:Invoke('AttackAnim') local target, hitPos = RayCast(Handle.CFrame.p, (MyMouse.Hit.p - Handle.CFrame.p).unit, 250) --local target = MyMouse.Target local shootDistance = MAX_SHOOT_DISTANCE --local hitPos = MyMouse.Hit.p if target and (target.CFrame.p - Handle.CFrame.p).magnitude < MAX_SHOOT_DISTANCE then OnHit(target) end --[[ local posCFrame = CFrame.new(Handle.CFrame.p, hitPos) local raCFrame = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Arm').CFrame posCFrame = (posCFrame - posCFrame.p) * ((raCFrame - raCFrame.p) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, 0, 0)) :inverse() Tool.Grip = posCFrame --]] local heartClone = AmmoPrefab:Clone() heartClone.Anchored = true local startPos = Handle.CFrame.p + Handle.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, 0.225, -1.3)) shootDistance = math.min(MAX_SHOOT_DISTANCE, (startPos - hitPos).magnitude) heartClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(startPos, hitPos) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) --local hsClone = HeartScript:Clone() --hsClone.Parent = heartClone --hsClone.Disabled = false -- weld heartClone to gun --[[ local weld = Instance.new('ManualWeld') weld.Part0 = Handle; weld.Part1 = heartClone; weld.C0 = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) * CFrame.new(0, 0.225, 1.3) weld.Parent = heartClone --]] if heartClone:FindFirstChild('Mesh') then heartClone.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.5,1.5,1) end heartClone.Parent = Workspace DebrisService:AddItem(heartClone, 10) Spawn(function() for i = 1, 20 do wait() if heartClone and heartClone:FindFirstChild('Mesh') then heartClone:FindFirstChild('Mesh').Scale = heartClone:FindFirstChild('Mesh').Scale + Vector3.new(0, 0, MAX_SHOOT_DISTANCE * SCALE_TO_STUD / 10) end end wait(0.1) heartClone.CFrame = heartClone.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) + heartClone.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0,0,245 / 2)) --heartClone.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0,0,MAX_SHOOT_DISTANCE * SCALE_TO_STUD/2)) for i = 1, 20 do wait() if heartClone and heartClone:FindFirstChild('Mesh') then heartClone:FindFirstChild('Mesh').Scale = heartClone:FindFirstChild('Mesh').Scale - Vector3.new(0, 0, MAX_SHOOT_DISTANCE * SCALE_TO_STUD/ 10) end end heartClone:Destroy() end)
wait(0.33) --[[ local spin = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") DebrisService:AddItem(spin, 0.3) spin.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, -30, 0) spin.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, 300000, 0) spin.Parent = MyTorso wait(0.3) if spin then spin:Destroy() end --]] wait(SWING_TIME - 0.33 - 0.3)
Tool.Enabled = true Attacking = false end
local Equipping = false function OnEquipped(mouse) if Equipping then return end Equipping = true MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyPlayer = PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(MyCharacter) MyTorso = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Torso') MyMouse = mouse MyHumanoid = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid')
CreatorTag = Instance.new('ObjectValue') CreatorTag.Name = 'creator' --NOTE: Must be called 'creator' for website stats CreatorTag.Value = MyPlayer
AnimationScript = WaitForChild(Tool,'AnimationScript') StartAnim = WaitForChild(AnimationScript, 'Start') StopAnim = WaitForChild(AnimationScript, 'Stop')
ShootSound = WaitForChild(Handle, 'Shoot') HitSound = WaitForChild(Handle, 'Hit')
HeartScript = WaitForChild(script, 'HeartScript')
--StartAnim:Invoke('IdleAnim', 0.5) Equipping = false end
local UnEquipping = false function OnUnequipped() if UnEquipping then return end UnEquipping = true if PlayerGui then PlayerGui:Destroy() PlayerGui = nil end UnEquipping = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated)

local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local contentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider") local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris')
local BASE_URL = contentProvider.BaseUrl local AmmoTXId = BASE_URL .. 'asset/?id=105977933' local AmmoMeshId = BASE_URL .. 'asset/?id=105992239'
local AmmoPrefab = Instance.new('Part') AmmoPrefab.FormFactor = 'Custom' AmmoPrefab.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.2) AmmoPrefab.Locked = true AmmoPrefab.TopSurface = 'Smooth' AmmoPrefab.BottomSurface = 'Smooth' AmmoPrefab.CanCollide = false AmmoPrefab.Transparency = 0 AmmoPrefab.Name = 'HeartMesh'
local AmmoMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') AmmoMesh.TextureId = AmmoTXId AmmoMesh.MeshId = AmmoMeshId AmmoMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2,2,1) -- Lets run randomize this from the range of (1,1,1) to (1,0,0) to add a little variation AmmoMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1,0.3,0.3) AmmoMesh.Parent = AmmoPrefab
local Torso = script.Parent
-- Wait because of set parent while setting parent bug wait()
local HeartBeatScript = WaitForChild(script, 'SoundScript') DebrisService:AddItem(HeartBeatScript, 5) HeartBeatScript.Parent = Torso HeartBeatScript.Disabled = false
local newAmmo = AmmoPrefab:Clone() DebrisService:AddItem(newAmmo, 5) newAmmo.Parent = Workspace
--wait()
local Weld = Instance.new('ManualWeld') Weld.Part0 = Torso Weld.Part1 = newAmmo Weld.C0 = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) * CFrame.new(0.3,0.42, 0.4) Weld.Name = "weld" Weld.Parent = newAmmo
while newAmmo and newAmmo:FindFirstChild('Mesh') do newAmmo:FindFirstChild('Mesh').Scale = Vector3.new(2,2,3.3 * (math.sin(tick() * 20) + 1.5))
wait() end
script:Destroy()

local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) assert(parent, "ERROR: WaitForChild: parent is nil") while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
wait()
local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris') local Torso = script.Parent
if Torso and not Torso:FindFirstChild('Heartbeat') then local HeartBeat = WaitForChild(script, 'Heartbeat'):Clone() DebrisService:AddItem(HeartBeat, 5) HeartBeat.Parent = Torso wait() HeartBeat:Play() end
